keyword: how many calories are in 6 oz chicken breast
title: How Many Calories Are in 6 oz Chicken Breast?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in 6 oz chicken breast, plus protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition facts, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in 6 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (grilled or roasted), no added oil, sauce, or seasonings; 6 oz â‰ˆ 170 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, cooking method, brand, added ingredients, and exact weight; check labels or use a food scale for precision.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~281 kcal and ~53 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil for cooking per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories are in 6 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 281 kcal for skinless, boneless, grilled or roasted.

faqs.q: How much protein is in 6 oz chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw 6 oz would cook down to about 4.5 oz and have similar nutrients but different water content.

faqs.q: Does adding marinade change calories in 6 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Yes, sugary or oil-based marinades can add 50+ kcal; plain herbs add minimal.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in 6 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Around 6.1 g total fat, with 1.7 g saturated, for skinless cooked breast.
